arts.ttl: Incredible scenes as Celtic dig deep with injury time winner against Motherwell
arts.sum: Celtic had to dig deep to record three points against Motherwell. The visitors from Fir Park gave a good account of themselves and found themselves ahead in the second half. Despite struggling in front of goal this season, Brendan Rodgers’ side won it thanks to goals from Benji Nygren and then the injury time winner Read More

arts.ttl: Maeda nets late winner to earn Celtic win over Motherwell
arts.sum: Daizen Maeda netted a 92nd-minute winner to complete a second-half turnaround and earn Celtic a 3-2 victory over Motherwell in the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: Celtic 3 Motherwell 2: Last gasp Daizen Maeda strikes to sicken Steelmen
arts.sum: Here are the talking points as Celtic left it late to seal a comeback win against Motherwell, as Daizen Maeda's injury time strike gave them three points.

arts.ttl: 'F**k the meeting': Celtic fans protest against board ahead of Motherwell clash
arts.sum: Further banners criticising the Celtic board were displayed ahead of the Motherwell match.

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Motherwell LIVE as Engels team leaks sums up uncertainty
arts.sum: The champions are aiming to cut the gap on Hearts back to two points

arts.ttl: Motherwell coming to Celtic Park to win says Jens Berthel Askou
arts.sum: Celtic captain Callum McGregor reckons that it’s quite right for Motherwell manager Jens Berthel Askou to bring his side to Celtic Park this afternoon looking to take the three points… Motherwell haven’t won at Celtic Park for ten years but after making an impressive start in his role at the Fir Park side, Jens Berthel Read More

arts.ttl: Hearts go five clear, Celtic must respond against Motherwell
arts.sum: Hearts lead the way on merit, they are currently five points clear of Celtic after grabbing a stoppage time winner over Hibs in the Edinburgh Derby yesterday. However it’s way too early to regard them as title contenders, remember some were saying that about Aberdeen last season too… We go into today’s clash with Motherwell Read More

arts.ttl: Kasper Schmeichel call made as Celtic make three changes in predicted XI vs Motherwell
arts.sum: Celts welcome the unbeaten Steelmen to Parkhead this weekend

arts.ttl: Celtic v Motherwell: team news, referee details, KO time & where to watch
arts.sum: Celtic face Motherwell on Sunday afternoon as Brendan Rodgers’ side look to get back to winning ways after the three games without a win. The draw on the road against Red Star Belgrade was followed up by a stalemate against Hibs then a Europa League defeat at the hands of Braga. The focus will shift Read More

arts.ttl: Captain Callum McGregor says Motherwell are right to be aiming for win at Celtic
arts.sum: Captain Callum McGregor says Motherwell are right to be aiming for win at Celtic
